list.name: device_type
list.query: union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")]) |> range(start: -1h) |> group(columns: ["_measurement"]) |> distinct(column: "_measurement")

list.name: location
list.query: union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")]) |> range(start: -1h) |> group(columns: ["location"]) |> distinct(column: "location")

targets.query:
union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")])
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power_output" or r._field == "heat_output" or r._field == "gas_flow_rate")
  |> sum()

union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")])
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "efficiency")
  |> mean()

union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")])
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> distinct(column: "device_id")
  |> count()

union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")])
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power_output" or r._field == "heat_output")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])

union(tables: [from(bucket: "wind-vawt-simulation"), from(bucket: "wind-hawt-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-1-simulation"), from(bucket: "algae-farm-2-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hybrid-simulation"), from(bucket: "energy-storage-simulation"), from(bucket: "heat-boiler-simulation"), from(bucket: "biogas-plant-simulation"), from(bucket: "engine-test-bench-simulation"), from(bucket: "pv-hulajnogi-simulation")])
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "efficiency")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement"])
